moduleMetadataJson.name: OpenVPN Gather Credentials
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module grab OpenVPN credentials from a running process
        in Linux.

        Note: --auth-nocache must not be set in the OpenVPN command line.
author: rvrsh3ll
Roberto Soares Espreto <robertoespreto@gmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: TMP_PATH
options.description: The path to the directory to save dump process
